name: Circular
headline: Subscription consumer electronics for Asia
description:
Circular is accelerating the adoption of the circular economy by making subscriptions the best way to access and experience tech: from smartphones, laptops, and headphones to gaming, VR and wearables.

Our customers get their hands on the best tech through low-cost, convenient subscriptions. They can pay monthly, keep it as long as they want, and if they love it, buy it. If they return it, we carefully refurbish it and pass it on to the next loving owner - radically extending its useful life.

founders.name: Nicolas Ramsay, Founder
founders.description: Nick Ramsay is the co-founder and CEO of Circular. Nick drives Circular's mission to accelerate the adoption of the circular economy by making subscriptions the best way to access and experience tech. Nick is a proven business leader with hands-on experience across product management, new venture building and business development and has been successfully scaling Fintech and marketplaces across SE-Asia for 10+ years.

founders.name: Yaniv Bernstein, Founder
founders.description: Yaniv Bernstein is the co-founder and COO of Circular. Yaniv is building a scalable and high-performing organisation in pursuit of Circular's mission to accelerate the adoption of the circular economy by making subscriptions the best way to access and experience tech. Yaniv is a proven organisational leader and technologist, working in Engineering at Google for 10 years, and then acting at VP Engineering and COO at Airtasker, Australia's leading local services marketplace.

founders.name: George Oliver, Founder
founders.description:
10+ years experience, including 7+ years experience in logistics in SE-Asia across large and small scale Log Tech Start-ups. 

Prior to co-founding Circular, George has held senior leadership positions at NinjaVan a new SG Unicorn (Head of Sea Freight) and Janio, a Sequoia-backed company (Head of B2B). Prior to that George co-founded Karzo, a logistics company in Myanmar.

founders.name: Pantha Roy, Founder
founders.description:
Pantha is a co-founder and the CPO of Circular. He drives the product strategy and development that is core to our mission of making subscriptions the best way to access and experience tech. 

Pantha has built product teams and products in a range of tech companies from early-stage to mature ones. Pantha started his career as a quant/trader at an investment bank in Europe. Pantha has engineering degrees from Imperial College, Cambridge University and an MBA from INSEAD.

https://www.pantha.io/

# Making subscriptions the best way to experience tech
[Singapore Store](https://www.nowcircular.com/<https:/nowcircular.sg/>)[Australia Store](https://www.nowcircular.com/<https:/nowcircular.com.au/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/66f642ea3af4b2116ba4ff06_iStock-1301081654.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64917b54837ffd907592ffa6/6491999ebe71c59abe169f61_circular%20color%20logo.svg)
is backed by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/6499779dc5eecec5b3908bc0_Y%20Combinator.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977a308c30ea4bc448106_what%20we%20do.jpeg)
## What we do
Circular is a tech subscription service that's evolving the way we consume technology. By subscribing, our customers have access to the latest tech from the best brands for budget-friendly monthly payments. Our mission is to help the world embrace the circular economy and say goodbye to the days of owning expensive tech devices. It’s a learned behaviour that we need to disrupt to usher in a new era where subscribing, rather than buying, is the norm. We’ve seen this trend with luxury handbags, clothes and cars. There’s no surprise that tech is the next big trend here. Our disruptive challenge to traditional tech device ownership may seem ambitious, but hey - look at how Netflix and Spotify transformed the consumption of movies and music. The planet needs us to change how we think about our phones, laptops and other devices.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977a89f4eaba465d13ac2_Diagram.png)
## How we do it
A circular economy is a sustainable approach to production and consumption. Rather than following the "take-make-waste" linear model, the circular economy aims to reduce waste and protect the environment. We’re all addicted to our devices (and that’s ok), but what we’re actually addicted to is the lifestyle they allow us to live and the connections they help us make. We don’t need to own the device to do this. Circular is helping people embrace a forward thinking approach where we are custodians of devices for a period of time, before they're passed on to the next consumer.So instead of tossing your old device (or it living out its days in your bottom drawer), we’ll refurbish or recycle it to minimise waste and reduce the impact on the environment.
#### As featured in
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd945a7_logo%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd945a4_logo%202.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd945a1_logo%203.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd94598_logo%204.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd9459e_logo%205.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd945aa_logo%206.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd9459b_logo%207.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd945a7_logo%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd945a4_logo%202.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd945a1_logo%203.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd94598_logo%204.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd9459e_logo%205.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd945aa_logo%206.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977add4816cfd4fd9459b_logo%207.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977b14e68f4e3552254da_singapore.jpeg)[Singapore Store](https://www.nowcircular.com/<https:/nowcircular.sg>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977b14e68f4e3552254dd_australia.jpeg)[Australia Store](https://www.nowcircular.com/<https:/nowcircular.com.au>)
## Where we do it
Circular provides innovative and sustainable solutions to businesses and individuals in Singapore and Australia.Singapore ranks among the top countries in the Asia-Pacific region for technology adoption, with a high penetration rate of mobile devices, e-commerce, and digital payment systems. In Australia, its advanced economy and tech-savvy population contribute to a high level of technology penetration, with a particular focus on renewable energy and smart city solutions.At Circular, we leverage our knowledge of these distinct cultures to deliver tailored solutions to our subscribers in both countries.
## How Circular subscriptions work
01
Choose your tech & subscription length
It's all about you and what suits your lifestyle.
02
Place your order
After creating an account we'll confirm your Spending Power.
03
Approved subscription
Sit back and relax. Your device will be delivered to your door for free.
04
At the end, you’ll be spoilt for choice
Upgrade, extend or return your device.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977b9d5d2087962075b88_interested%20.jpeg)
## Interested in helping us do it?
As a rapidly growing Startup we know our success depends on the talented and committed individuals who make up our team.At Circular, you'll have the independence to use your creativity and skills, with the support of like-minded individuals dedicated to transforming the way we approach business. We've already achieved a lot, but there's still so much more to do. If you're looking for a career that's both challenging and fulfilling, we invite you to join us.
[Circular careers](https://www.nowcircular.com/</careers>)
### Circular for Business - crafted for Startups and SMEs
Our business subscriptions are designed to balance affordability and flexibility. We’re an obvious first choice for sustainability minded businesses. However the subscription model appeals broadly as it enables businesses to unlock cash flow. We’re proud to help power and enable growth across a growing network of businesses in Singapore and Australia.
[Singapore](https://www.nowcircular.com/<https:/nowcircular.sg/business>)[Australia](https://www.nowcircular.com/<https:/nowcircular.com.au/business>)
Showing our 5-Star reviews
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977c1a1e0a71956096584_tp%20star.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977c1a1e0a71956096584_tp%20star.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977c1a1e0a71956096584_tp%20star.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977c1a1e0a71956096584_tp%20star.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977c1a1e0a71956096584_tp%20star.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622e2a9ca955ec864400395e/649977c1a1e0a71956096585_tp%20verified.svg)
#### Swap
At 1st I was sceptical but after trying & been using their service. Love that the option to make a swap is super easy & smooth, of coz they’ll check your track record. The reminders that send to make sure, you’re aware of the upcoming payment is also a good service. 👍🏽 Definitely will recommend!
MKBMJ
January 16, 2024

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Circular**

**Founding and Background**
Circular was founded in 2021 and quickly became a part of Y Combinator’s Winter 2022 batch. Operating out of Singapore, it employs a dedicated team of 25 individuals. The company is primarily focused on revolutionizing how consumers access technology through a subscription model, making it a central player in the Asian market for consumer electronics.

**Mission**
The mission of Circular is straightforward yet impactful: to promote the circular economy by providing convenient, affordable subscriptions for consumer electronics throughout Asia. By transitioning from ownership to rental, Circular aims to redefine our relationship with technology.

**What They Offer**
Circular has designed its services to cater to the tech-savvy consumer who wants access to the latest gadgets—think smartphones, laptops, VR equipment, and gaming gear—without the hefty price tag associated with outright purchases. Here’s how it works:

1. **Choose**: Customers select the device they want and determine their subscription length.
2. **Order**: After creating an account, they’ll receive confirmation of their spending power.
3. **Delivery**: Devices are delivered for free right to the customer’s doorstep.
4. **Options**: At the end of the subscription, users can choose to upgrade, extend, or return the device.

If a customer decides to return a device, Circular refurbishes and rents it out again, extending its lifecycle and reducing waste—a win-win for consumers and the planet.

**Business Model**
By promoting a subscription model, Circular encourages users to experience ownership without the commitment. This approach not only aligns with sustainability but also reflects changing consumer preferences, where renting is becoming as accepted as owning.

**Target Market**
Circular primarily operates in Singapore and Australia, two regions with high technology adoption rates. By tapping into these markets, Circular caters to a tech-savvy, environmentally-conscious demographic looking for budget-friendly options.

**Industry Positioning**
Circular positions itself at the intersection of several industries, tagged under fintech, marketplace, consumer electronics, and e-commerce. This broad positioning enables it to be flexible and innovative in how it addresses consumer needs.

**Team and Support**
Backing and mentorship from seasoned partners, including Dalton Caldwell from Y Combinator, provide Circular with the resources needed to thrive and innovate in this space.

**Conclusion**
In a world where tech gadgets cycle in and out of trend at breakneck speed, Circular offers a refreshing approach—subscription over ownership. Their commitment to sustainability and customer satisfaction places them on a promising trajectory, aligned with modern consumption behaviors and environmental needs.

For more information, visit [Circular's website](https://www.nowcircular.com).
